title: GermanVocabularyLesson
description: A schema for a German vocabulary lesson.

title.description: The title of the vocabulary lesson in English.

vocabularies.description: A list of German vocabulary words.

englishTranslation.description: The English translation of the word.

lemma.description: The base form (lemma) of the word in German.

gender.description: The grammatical gender. MUST be one of 'der' (masculine), 'die' (feminine), or 'das' (neuter).

pluralForm.description: The plural form of the word, if applicable.

separablePrefix.description: The separable prefix for verbs, if applicable.
